FuncDef: This command configures up to four Network Basic Input/Output System (NetBIOS) name server IP addresses.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to four NetBIOS name server IP addresses. The address must be unique within the subnet and specified in dotted decimal notation. Allowed values are IP addresses in the range 1.0.0.0 - 223.255.255.255 (with support of /31 subnets).
